      • getBytesTmp

        public static byte[] getBytesTmp(int size)
        returns a thread local byte array of at least the size requested. use only for temporary purpose. This method needs to be carefully used!
        Parameters:
        size - - the minimum size of the temporary buffer requested.
        Returns:
        - the temporary buffer.

      • getCharsTmp

        public static char[] getCharsTmp(int size)
        returns a thread local char array of at least the requested size. Use only for temporary purpose.
        Parameters:
        size - - the minimum size of the temporary buffer requested.
        Returns:
        - the temporary buffer.

public static <T> void fill(T[] array,
                                  int startIdx,
